title: Design Sensor Network Architecture
description: Develop the overall architecture for the sensor network that monitors industrial processes in real-time.

title: Define Sensor Types and Functionalities
description: Research and define the types of sensors required for monitoring various industrial processes, as well as their functionalities.

title: Develop IoT Communication Protocol
description: Create a communication protocol for the sensor network to effectively transmit data from the sensors to the central system.

title: Develop Real-Time Data Processing Algorithms
description: Create algorithms for processing the real-time data received from the sensors to derive meaningful insights.

title: Design User Interface for Monitoring Dashboard
description: Create an intuitive and user-friendly dashboard to display the data received from the sensors in a meaningful way.
